relation: Merge pull request #4787 from kennyj/fix_4754-2 [Backport][3-1-stable] Fix GH #4754. Remove double-quote characters around PK when using sql_mode=ANSI_QUOTES
Fix GH #4754. Remove double-quote characters around PK when using sql_mode=ANSI_QUOTES
Merge pull request #4514 from brainopia/update_timezone_offets Update time zone offset information

Fix ActiveModel::Errors#dup Since ActiveModel::Errors instance keeps all error messages as hash we should duplicate this object as well. Previously ActiveModel::Errors was a subclass of ActiveSupport::OrderedHash, which results in different behavior on dup, this may result in regression for people relying on it. Because Rails 3.2 stills supports Ruby 1.8.7 in order to properly fix this regression we need to backport #initi…
Add ActiveModel::Errors#delete, which was not available after move to use delegation

Add therubyracer gem commented in default Gemfile (3.1.x)
Mention how use config.assets.prefix to avoid conflicting with an existing "/assets" route
config.force_ssl should mark the session as secure.

First attempt at providing a 'what to update' section for Rails 3.1
Merge pull request #4418 from tomstuart/read-and-write-attribute-aliases-3-1-stable #[] and #[]= are no longer interchangeable with #read_attribute and #write_attribute (3-1-stable)
Revert "Base#[] and Base#[]= are aliases so implement them as aliases :)" This reverts commit 21eadc1b3f2eb818a4833381ee0a6cfa205f2955.
Test that #[] and #[]= keep working when #read_attribute and #write_attribute are overridden
Merge pull request #4412 from kennyj/fix_3743 Fix GH #3743. We must specify an encoding in rdoc_option explicitly.
Fix http digest authentication with trailing '/' or '?' (fixes #4038 and #3228)
Add original_fullpath and original_url methods to Request

Add ORIGINAL_FULLPATH to env This behaves similarly to REQUEST_URI, but we need to implement it on our own because REQUEST_URI is not reliable. Note that since PATH_INFO does not contain information about trailing question mark, this is not 100% accurate, for example `/foo?` will result in `/foo` in ORIGINAL_FULLPATH
Pass extensions to javascript_path and stylesheet_path helpers. Closes #3417
Override respond_to? since we are also overriding method_missing.
